p.k: The Titans are outraged when their favourite cartoon is rebooted, so they come up with a plan to get this new show off the air. / Robin surprises the Titans with a trip to the opera, but they soon fall asleep, and all dream about starring in their own operas. / The Titans are at Super Hero Summer Camp for the week and they may need to add another teammate to win the big canoe race. / The Titans give Robin advice to guide him through his camp romance with Wonder Girl. / Robin tells the Titans to stop being reckless teens or the Creepy Catcher will get them.
